snippet: An American who fled the United Arab Emirates while on bail appeared in court on Thursday after being deported back to Dubai and will be charged with leaving the country illegally.
lead_paragraph: An American who fled the United Arab Emirates while on bail appeared in court on Thursday after being deported back to Dubai and will be charged with leaving the country illegally.

headline.main: United Arab Emirates: New Charges for American
headline.print_headline: United Arab Emirates: New Charges for American
